title: @ Disco heat

embed.description: Facebook Page! ► https://www.facebook.com/eroticdiscoheat SNAPCHAT ► THEDISCOHEAT STREAM ► http://www.twitch.tv/discoheat Interact with me on Twitter! ► https://twitter.com/thediscoheat ALL MUSIC! ► http://grooveshark.com/discoheat Videos exposing the flamers, racists, ragers & bullies that have poisoned a once peaceful community that is League Of Legends. Edited, Filmed, Composed by Disco Heat.

body: Please edit me out of your recent video from 6 :00 to 6:20. I dont see how that statement was even "toxic" it was merely stating an opinion.

replies.body: But you made yourself look like an absolute idiot!

> Yeah you did

No he didn't, he made a simple statement, Disco Heat is just a pathetic child who takes everything out of context when 9/10 he %%%%ing flamebaits the situation. He's the real child in League, rofl.
exactly. My statement was in no way shape or form  intended to be aggressive or hurtful towards anyone, it was merely a strong opinion.

> > Yeah you did
> 
> No he didn't, he made a simple statement, Disco Heat is just a pathetic child who takes everything out of context when 9/10 he %%%%ing flamebaits the situation. He's the real child in League, rofl.

for once i agree.
Still, and always will be bad.
